sections.label: Jan: Bett Show 2016
sections.description:
The CommonTown team, comprising of Mr Joel Loo, CEO, and Mr Jasmond Ng, Director of Sales and Business Development, were in London for the world's largest education technology exhibition - Bett Show 2016! The Bett Show spanned four days, from 25th to 28th January 2016. At the Bett Show, Mr Loo and Mr Ng had the opportunity to network with educational technology experts from around the world over several networking sessions and round table discussions.

CommonTown showcased our Qoqolo Pre-school Management System and Dudu Personalised Chinese Learning System at the exhibition as a part of the Singapore Pavilion. 

We would like to extend our thanks and appreciation to IE Singapore for this amazing and eye-opening opportunity to showcase our products at this prestigious exhibition in London. We are looking forward to participating in international events in the future, and having the chance to network and exchange ideas with educational technology industry leaders from around the world!
